metadata.title: client side invocation timeout raised when calling over HTTP2 (important)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: A flaw was found in Undertow that tripped the client-side invocation timeout with certain calls made over HTTP2. This flaw allows an attacker to carry out denial of service attacks. 
            STATEMENT: Red Hat OpenStack Platform's OpenDaylight will not be updated for this flaw because it was deprecated as of OpenStack Platform 14 and is only receiving security fixes for Critical flaws.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
opendaylight is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
